rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Open foyer with Vastu compliant east-west entry orientation, ensuring positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious Mediterranean-style living area integrated with the open-plan kitchen and dining area. Features stone accents and arches for aesthetic appeal.

rooms.name: Open-Plan Kitchen & Dining Area
rooms.description: Modern Mediterranean kitchen with integrated dining space. Uses natural stones, open design to maintain flow between cooking and living spaces. Vastu principles ensure balance of elements.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Luxurious bedroom with ample closet space and window placements adhering to Vastu guidelines for prosperity and calm.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Cozy second bedroom suitable for family members or guests; positioned in the north-east zone as per Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Additional bedroom maintaining balance and privacy; aligned with local building norms for irregular plot adaptation.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: Small ensuite bathroom designed for guest convenience, located on the ground floor as per design layout.

openings.description: Entry door adhering to Vastu principles with eastward orientation for positive energy.
Large windows to ensure natural light and airflow; strategically placed in accordance with Vastu.
Pool access door ensuring privacy and alignment with local regulations.
Small door for access to an extended balcony space, integrating outdoor view and air circulation.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Expanded master bedroom with en-suite bathroom and balcony ensuring privacy and relaxation as per Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: En-suite Bathroom
rooms.description: Private bath area for the master bedroom, designed to maintain balance in energy flow according to Vastu.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2 (upper)
rooms.description: Additional bedroom on first floor positioned for optimal light and air circulation.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3 (upper)
rooms.description: Secondary bedroom ensuring sufficient space and privacy; designed following local norms.

openings.description: Main staircase with safety railings and Vastu-compliant positioning.
Windows in bedrooms to ensure proper ventilation and light while preserving privacy.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Additional guest bedroom on the top floor with south-facing window as per Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Study/Observation Room
rooms.description: Multipurpose room for work or relaxation; designed to face east for prosperity.

openings.description: Staircase ensuring safe vertical movement between floors.
Strategically placed windows for natural light and maintaining Vastu balance.

swimming_pool.description: Integrated swimming pool designed to enhance the Mediterranean aesthetic while ensuring privacy and adherence to local safety codes.

irregular_plot_adaptation.description: The design incorporates flexible spatial planning to adapt to the irregular shape of the plot. Strategic use of open spaces, partition walls, and multi-functional rooms ensures compliance with both local building norms and Vastu principles.
